import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Answer extends Component { displayElement = () => { var no = new Audio('/music/no.mp3'); var yes = new Audio('/music/yes.mp3'); switch (this.props.answer.ans) { case 1: return ( <> yes.play()}> no.play()}> no.play()}> no.play()}> ) case 2: return ( <> no.play()}> yes.play()}> no.play()}> no.play()}> ) case 3: return ( <> no.play()}> no.play()}> yes.play()}> no.play()}> ) default: return ( <> no.play()}> no.play()}> no.play()}> yes.play()}> ) } } render() { return ( <>
{this.displayElement()}
); } } export default Answer;
